Reto Gerber.existingQuote: Ein Profi durch und durch, sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis! Wir sind mit dem Resultat äusserst zufrieden.

variations.quote: Noevu kombiniert Innovation und Präzision, und uns zu einer Webseite verholfen, die nicht nur durch ihre Qualität besticht, sondern auch durch einfache Bedienung begeistert. Absolute Empfehlung!“
variations.author: Reto Gerber

variations.quote: The website agency Noevu combines innovation and precision, and has developed a beautiful new company website for us that not only impresses with its quality, but is also easy to use. An absolute recommendation!
variations.author: Reto Gerber

variations.quote: Noevu kombiniert Innovation und Experten-Wissen, und hat für uns eine Squarespace Webseite entwickelt, die nicht nur durch ihre Qualität besticht, sondern auch durch einfache Bedienung begeistert. Absolute Empfehlung!“
variations.author: Reto Gerber

variations.quote: Die Webseiten Agentur Noevu kombiniert Innovation und Präzision, und hat für uns eine schöne neue Firmen-Webseite entwickelt, die nicht nur durch ihre Qualität besticht, sondern auch durch einfache Bedienung begeistert. Absolute Empfehlung!“

variations.author: Reto Gerber

variations.author: Reto Gerber

Benedikt Vogel.existingQuote: Noevu hat uns hoch professionell, engagiert und termingerecht zu einer tollen neuen online Präsenz verholfen. Die Zusammenarbeit war jederzeit konstruktiv, die Beratung hervorragend.

variations.quote: Our web project was implemented perfectly thanks to a clear structure and efficient processes. Our new SME website exceeds expectations and gives our customers an attractive showcase for our work.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

variations.quote: Thanks to Noevu's professional advice and help, we were able to implement our website project perfectly. The new homepage exceeds our expectations and opens the doors to our work for our customers.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

variations.quote: Our project was implemented perfectly thanks to Noevu's expertise, clear structure and efficient time management. Our new Squarespace homepage exceeds expectations and gives our clients an attractive showcase for our work.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

variations.quote: Our project went perfectly thanks to the expertise of Noevu, and their good planning and time management. Our new Squarespace homepage looks great and clearly shows our work to our clients.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

variations.quote: We wanted to have a new website developed. Thanks to a clear structure and efficient time management, Noevu implemented our project perfectly. The new website exceeds our expectations and opens the doors to our work wide for our customers.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

variations.quote: We wanted to have a new Squarespace homepage developed. Thanks to a clear structure and efficient time management, Noevu implemented our project perfectly. The new website exceeds our expectations and opens the doors to our work wide for our customers.
variations.author: Benedikt Vogel

findings.testimonialAuthorsMatch: The extracted testimonials (Reto Gerber, Benedikt Vogel) match 2 of the 10 existing testimonials in testimonials.json
findings.quoteVariations: Multiple quote variations were found for both authors across different pages
findings.newTestimonials: The existing testimonials.json contains 8 additional testimonials not found in the extracted markdown pages
findings.recommendation: The existing testimonials.json is more comprehensive with 10 diverse testimonials. The extracted testimonials show that Reto Gerber and Benedikt Vogel quotes are used extensively across the site with slight variations.
